thread.title: Facebook expands search function to public posts
thread.title_full: Facebook expands search function to public posts

title: Facebook expands search function to public posts
text:
Facebook expands search function to public posts 
Z News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Washington: Facebook has announced Search FYI, an expanded search function that will allow users to find out what the world is saying about a particular topic. 
...
